aththatama modaya kiyanne thaman me gewana yugaye sata kapata kam katta kayirati kam gana adahasak nathi pudgalaya.eeth modayage bhumikawa rangapanna, thaman gatha karana, thamath athulu samajaya gana hondin danumwath namuth ee bawak nopenwa, modaya se hasirena thek thamange awasthawa paminena thuru hora gal ahulannek.

eeth ithin mak karandada? 2011 agosthu 31 dina pa.wa. 9:52 ta jiwithe palaweni parata blog ekak kiyawala ahata kadulu aawe akke oya siddiya oya widiyatama matath wela thiyanawa eth mama nama thaththa pettiye innawa nam mama baluwe na 2011 sapthambar 9 dina pa.wa. 4:55 ta mata thaththage mala gedara gewuna hati hinayak wage thamath malli…
me pituwa anthimata sakasuwe 29 agosthu 2016 dina di, 13:36 welawehidiya.
